Comprehensive Monitoring Solutions

GridMonitor provides all the tools you need to stay ahead of energy legislation and regulatory changes in Texas.

ERCOT Monitoring*

Real-time tracking of ERCOT meetings, decisions, and market notices that impact your business.

Video Library

Access recordings of key hearings, meetings, and sessions from all relevant regulatory bodies.

Document Analysis*

Stay informed with detailed analysis of legislative documents, rule changes, and regulatory filings.

Meeting Calendar

Never miss an important date with our comprehensive calendar of open meetings, workshops, working groups, and legislative committies and sessions.

Conference Coverage*

Get insights from energy industry conferences and events without having to attend in person.

AI Assistant

Ask our AI assistant questions about ERCOT, PUCT, and Texas Legislature to get quick answers.

Grid Monitor for ERCOT

We collect, organize, and continuously track your ERCOT Regulatory projects of interest with filings, agendas, curated news, and original reporting across all three relevant regulatory venues — ERCOT, PUCT, and the TX State Legislature — in one, easy-to-use platform.

Smart Agenda

Save time and stay productive. Whether you're researching past meetings or watching meetings live, Grid Monitor’s Smart Agenda brings the agenda to life with video clips, news, filings, and more, in one easy-to-use view for each meeting across ERCOT, PUCT, and the Texas Legislature.

Streaming Meetings
Access Grid Monitor’s entire catalog of meeting videos across ERCOT, PUCT, and the Texas Legislature. We archive the publicly available ERCOT stakeholder process from top to bottom.
Meeting Summaries
Just the facts. Grid Monitor’s unbiased meeting summaries make it easy to digest previously overwhelming amounts of information. Tagged with Related Controls and links to corresponding video, taking a closer look has never been more efficient.
